name: Ext.Action
doc:
An Action is a piece of reusable functionality that can be abstracted out of any particular component so that it can be usefully shared among multiple components. Actions let you share handlers, configuration options and UI updates across any components that support the Action interface (primarily Ext.toolbar.Toolbar, Ext.button.Button and Ext.menu.Menu components).

Use a single Action instance as the config object for any number of UI Components which share the same configuration. The Action not only supplies the configuration, but allows all Components based upon it to have a common set of methods called at once through a single call to the Action.

Any Component that is to be configured with an Action must also support the following methods:

  • setText(string)
  • setIconCls(string)
  • setDisabled(boolean)
  • setVisible(boolean)
  • setHandler(function)

This allows the Action to control its associated Components.

Example usage:

// Define the shared Action.  Each Component below will have the same
// display text and icon, and will display the same message on click.
var action = new Ext.Action({
    text: 'Do something',
    handler: function(){
        Ext.Msg.alert('Click', 'You did something.');
    },
    iconCls: 'do-something',
    itemId: 'myAction'
});

var panel = new Ext.panel.Panel({
    title: 'Actions',
    width: 500,
    height: 300,
    tbar: [
        // Add the Action directly to a toolbar as a menu button
        action,
        {
            text: 'Action Menu',
            // Add the Action to a menu as a text item
            menu: [action]
        }
    ],
    items: [
        // Add the Action to the panel body as a standard button
        new Ext.button.Button(action)
    ],
    renderTo: Ext.getBody()
});

// Change the text for all components using the Action
action.setText('Something else');

// Reference an Action through a container using the itemId
var btn = panel.getComponent('myAction');
var aRef = btn.baseAction;
aRef.setText('New text');

members.name: disabled
members.doc: True to disable all components configured by this Action, false to enable them.
members.short_doc: True to disable all components configured by this Action, false to enable them. ...

members.name: handler
members.doc: The function that will be invoked by each component tied to this Action when the component's primary event is triggered.

members.name: hidden
members.doc: True to hide all components configured by this Action, false to show them.
members.short_doc: True to hide all components configured by this Action, false to show them. ...

members.name: iconCls
members.doc:
The CSS class selector that specifies a background image to be used as the header icon for all components configured by this Action.

An example of specifying a custom icon class would be something like:

// specify the property in the config for the class:
     ...
     iconCls: 'do-something'

// css class that specifies background image to be used as the icon image:
.do-something { background-image: url(../images/my-icon.gif) 0 6px no-repeat !important; }

There are no default icon classes that come with Ext JS.
members.short_doc:
The CSS class selector that specifies a background image to be used as the header icon for
all components configured ...

members.name: itemId
members.doc: See Ext.Component.itemId.

members.name: scope
members.doc: The scope (this reference) in which the handler is executed. Defaults to the browser window.
members.short_doc: The scope (this reference) in which the handler is executed. ...

members.name: text
members.doc: The text to set for all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: The text to set for all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: isAction
members.doc: true in this class to identify an object as an instantiated Action, or subclass thereof.
members.short_doc: true in this class to identify an object as an instantiated Action, or subclass thereof. ...

members.name: constructor
members.doc: Creates new Action.
members.short_doc: Creates new Action. ...

members.name: addComponent
callEach
disable
members.doc: Disables all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Disables all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: each
members.doc: Executes the specified function once for each Component currently tied to this Action. The function passed in should accept a single argument that will be an object that supports the basic Action config/method interface.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The function to execute for each component

params.name: scope
params.doc: The scope (this reference) in which the function is executed. Defaults to the Component.

members.short_doc: Executes the specified function once for each Component currently tied to this Action. ...

members.name: enable
members.doc: Enables all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Enables all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: execute
members.doc: Executes this Action manually using the handler function specified in the original config object or the handler function set with setHandler. Any arguments passed to this function will be passed on to the handler function.

params.name: args
params.doc: Variable number of arguments passed to the handler function

members.short_doc:
Executes this Action manually using the handler function specified in the original config object
or the handler funct...

members.name: getIconCls
members.doc: Gets the icon CSS class currently used by all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Gets the icon CSS class currently used by all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: getText
members.doc: Gets the text currently displayed by all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Gets the text currently displayed by all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: hide
members.doc: Hides all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Hides all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: isDisabled
members.doc: Returns true if the components using this Action are currently disabled, else returns false.
members.short_doc: Returns true if the components using this Action are currently disabled, else returns false. ...

members.name: isHidden
members.doc: Returns true if the components configured by this Action are currently hidden, else returns false.
members.short_doc: Returns true if the components configured by this Action are currently hidden, else returns false. ...

members.name: removeComponent
setDisabled
members.doc: Sets the disabled state of all components configured by this Action. Shortcut method for enable and disable.

params.name: disabled
params.doc: True to disable the component, false to enable it

members.short_doc: Sets the disabled state of all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: setHandler
members.doc: Sets the function that will be called by each Component using this action when its primary event is triggered.

params.name: fn
params.doc: The function that will be invoked by the action's components. The function will be called with no arguments.

params.name: scope
params.doc: The scope (this reference) in which the function is executed. Defaults to the Component firing the event.

members.short_doc: Sets the function that will be called by each Component using this action when its primary event is triggered. ...

members.name: setHidden
members.doc: Sets the hidden state of all components configured by this Action. Shortcut method for hide and show.

params.name: hidden
params.doc: True to hide the component, false to show it.

members.short_doc: Sets the hidden state of all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: setIconCls
members.doc: Sets the icon CSS class for all components configured by this Action. The class should supply a background image that will be used as the icon image.

params.name: cls
params.doc: The CSS class supplying the icon image

members.short_doc: Sets the icon CSS class for all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: setText
members.doc: Sets the text to be displayed by all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Sets the text to be displayed by all components configured by this Action. ...

members.name: show
members.doc: Shows all components configured by this Action.
members.short_doc: Shows all components configured by this Action. ...
